data1.Desc: Any The ${globals.password} variable value is missing on the Redis Cluster after cloning
Any PostgreSQL users created via phpPgAdmin cannot access the admin panel
Any Login to WebAdmin Console fails for the LiteSpeed/LLSMP stacks after redeployment to the lower major version
Any The Multi-Regional Redis Cluster package installation fails if the maximum allowed length is used for the provided domain name
An error occurs when installing the 'test' version of the Plesk package from the platform Marketplace
The Django application is not working after installation from the platform Marketplace
An error occurs when installing the Eclipse Vert.x Thin Jar Builder package from the platform Marketplace
An error occurs when installing the Nexus package from the platform Marketplace
An error occurs when installing the Open Liberty application in the Kubernetes cluster
The custom withExtIp setting is not applied when installing the Let’s Encrypt add-on
An error occurs when installing the Spring Boot Thin Jar Builder package from the platform Marketplace
An error occurs when installing the Oddo-Ce package from the platform Marketplace

data2.Desc: Incorrect environment name in the successful migration pop-up if the name contains special characters
The upload limit warning message is absent if the uploaded file size is too large
An error occurs when logged in to the dashboard with the Extended token
The “text input” input method does not work in Web SSH client
Cannot reconnect to the Web SSH client after a container restart
The access denied error occurs when calling billing API methods using a token
Disconnected from Web SSH if switched to a different tab during the connection
The bind SSL/external domain actions are absent in the Tasks manager when working with the Let’s Encrypt add-on
Incorrect description for the EditNodeGroup method in the API documentation
Text from Web SSH that does not fit the screen width is copied with unnecessary line breaks
An error occurs when opening the topology wizard
The MIME type of the uploaded archives is identified incorrectly if its name contains spaces
The region icon tooltip is formatted incorrectly in the search menu
An error occurs when deploying a GitHub project with the “/” symbol in the branch name
An error occurs when uploading a file with the overwrite option via the file manager
An error occurs when opening the Additionally menu for nodes with the admin panel
Inconsistent firewall rules behavior on the Memcached node when working with containers with public IP
The search results are not displayed after long usage of the dashboard on accounts with many environments
The vertical scroll should appear for the public keys list if it does not fit the window
An error occurs when updating a project with the “Auto resolve conflict” option after the amended commit to the repo
The add-on installation window is not centered
Incorrect spelling in the error message
NFS storage is not stable with the Kubernetes cluster
Incorrect event names in the SendEvent API method description
An error occurs when working with Object Browser on the Minio cluster
API requests return an empty response instead of an error if the platformUrl parameter has a dot at the end
An incorrect host header is set during the external domain swap
The primary IP is changed when adding a second external IP address
The “Got signal 13” error occurs when adding a new node to the environment
An error occurs while getting the state of a custom Docker container during environment creation
The package installation error occurs when redeploying containers based on the Debian 11 OS
The bindSslCert API method returns “result: 0” instead of the error when the incorrect extDomains parameter is specified
